title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Mechanism: Mechanisms and conversion of motion. Analysis and synthesis of simple mechanisms. Farm Machinery Mechanisms: Mechanisms used in crop production and processing machines. Friction Devices: Friction. Belt, rope and chain drives. Brakes and dynamometers. Common mechanisms: Gearing. Tractor gear trains. Cams. Governors. Balancing: Balancing of rotating and reciprocating parts. Flywheel. Introduction to vibration in machines.
